name: Mountimals
description:
A small Virtual pet game where you raise a monster in hopes of getting the best mountimal possible to race and be the best Mountimals Rancher around!

V.1.0:

- Base game ready, this means you'll hatch a pet, raise it up to 3 stages and then keep it.

Planned: 

-Racing minigame

- Barn (for pet storage)

Note: This is a project for my finals at a course I'm following, any and all constructive feedback is welcome.

I made a community board for any feedback. please keep everything in the appropriate topic so I can find it easier.
